newsitem.title: USA: IMM currencies finish mixed, yen edge off highs.
newsitem.headline: IMM currencies finish mixed, yen edge off highs.

text.p: Nov 8 - IMM currency futures finished mixed. Yen edged off highs, with one French-based firm selling 1,000 at $0.008992. Marks remained near the upper end of 1-1/2-mos range, but marks and Swiss francs remain in long-term downtrend, analysts said. Can dollars were off, but seen rising next week. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
